<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="Contact List">db39784983541a10b3fb7230feaad329</macroponent><name>company_contacts_repeater/now_default/repeatWith</name><preset/><required_translations>[]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
  * @param {params} params
  * @param {api} params.api
  * @param {TransformApiHelpers} params.helpers
  */
function evaluateProperty({api, helpers}) {
  const contactsAtCompany = api.data.get_other_contacts_in_company.results;
  const selectedContactSysId = api.state.selectedContact.sys_id.value;
	return contactsAtCompany.filter(contact => contact.sys_id.value != selectedContactSysId);
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>reece.poulsen</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-08-27 04:01:20</sys_created_on><sys_id>6f740f0983145a10b3fb7230feaad36f</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>company_contacts_repeater/now_default/repeatWith</sys_name><sys_package display_value="BAM - You & I Builder Live!
